description:
Guns of Boom is a free-to-play multiplayer first-person shooter game developed and published by Gameloft for iOS and Android devices. Released in 2017, it allows players to battle online in 4v4 team deathmatch modes.

The game takes place in a near future setting featuring advanced weaponry and equipment. Players control soldiers and compete across various maps ranging from urban city streets to deserts and jungles. A variety of firearms are available representing different weapon classes like assault rifles, sniper rifles, shotguns, and more.

Weapons can be customized with scopes, grips, and other mods to suit different playstyles. Players earn in-game currency and loot boxes by completing matches and leveling up, which can be used to unlock new weapons, gear, and cosmetic items.

With simple touch controls optimized for mobile, Guns of Boom provides intense short-form combat matches that players can easily fit into their schedule. Its crisp visuals and third-person perspective also make it approachable for those new to first-person shooters. Since launching, it has garnered a large following on iOS and Android as an action-packed multiplayer experience.
name: Guns of Boom

yoast_head_json.og_description: Guns of Boom is a free-to-play multiplayer first-person shooter game developed and published by Gameloft for iOS and Android devices. Released in 2017, it allows players to battle online in 4v4 team deathmatch modes. The game takes place in a near future setting featuring advanced weaponry and equipment. Players control soldiers and compete across various maps ranging from urban city streets to deserts and jungles. A variety of firearms are available representing different weapon classes like assault rifles, sniper rifles, shotguns, and more. Weapons can be customized with scopes, grips, and other mods to suit different playstyles. Players earn in-game currency and loot boxes by completing matches and leveling up, which can be used to unlock new weapons, gear, and cosmetic items. With simple touch controls optimized for mobile, Guns of Boom provides intense short-form combat matches that players can easily fit into their schedule. Its crisp visuals and third-person perspective also make it approachable for those new to first-person shooters. Since launching, it has garnered a large following on iOS and Android as an action-packed multiplayer experience.
